A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Everyone saying this is "SW for Millennials" or "SW for girls" or "SW for people of color" STOP saying that!
I'm a girl... I'm Asian... I'm a Millennial... and I HATED this garbage! 

If Disney really expected this would attract people like me\, their marketing ppl are delusional. In fact\, Rose and the woman with purple hair were the characters I least connected with and Porgs are a dumb CGI commercial for toys.
 
Such a shame because at the end TFA I really wanted to know what happens next to Rey\, Finn\, Kylo\, etc.
Now i've seen it\, I don't care anymore. Episode IX? I just... don't... care.
